title: Designing Elementary Language Education through Virtual Co-Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment where learners, teachers, and parents from diverse regions collaboratively design language education curricula in virtual settings

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language education contents by collaborating with peers and stakeholders using VR-based simulation tools.
Learners improve their communicative competence in the target language by 40% using educational materials developed through a co-creation process.
Learners experience the process of providing and incorporating feedback on instructional design at least twice using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
